revised_title: Lignin Biodegradation and Potential Chemicals from Lignin
tldr: This article discusses the biodegradation of lignin by white-rot fungi and the potential chemicals that can be obtained from lignin. The author explores the catabolic pathways and enzyme systems used by these fungi to break down lignin into various products. The article also highlights the challenges in processing lignin for useful chemicals and the need for further research to improve the efficiency of lignin biodegradation.
